scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @renderlite/shared && npm run typecheck -w @renderlite/api && npm run typecheck -w @renderlite/worker && npm run typecheck -w @renderlite/frontend
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.db:generate: npm run db:generate -w @renderlite/api && npm run db:generate -w @renderlite/worker
scripts.setup:db: npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.setup:local: npm run docker:up && npm run setup:db
scripts.docker:up: docker compose up -d postgres redis traefik
